answers.answer: Hi!If you have missed your periods, then test for pregnancy. If not then, unexplained aches and pains could be due to fibromyalgia, chronic fatigue syndrome, rheumatoid arthritis, lupus, Crohn’s disease, H pylori infection, anemia, liver disorders, diabetes, hypothyroidism, Vit B12 or Vit D deficiency and due to calcium or magnesium deficiency. It can also be due to sleep related disorders. In women it can be due to hormonal disturbances related to PCOD. This needs a comprehensive investigation. Consult a doctor please. Take care!

question: I have frequent headaches, chest pains near or away from my heart, back pains, random cramping and I have just noticed that I have recently been getting sick often. Should I be worried?
title: I have so many symptoms
